definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Even so, the peace activists of the day reacted to the news of his Nobel Prize with mortification.
sentences.chinese: 當時的和平活動家們也對他成爲諾獎得主感到恥辱。

sentences.english: Zhang Shizhao was a famous statesman and political critic in modern Chinese history.
sentences.chinese: 章士釗是我國近現代史上著名的政治活動家和政論家。

sentences.english: We dined with royalty, heads of states, authors, and activists.
sentences.chinese: 我們和皇室，政府首腦，作家，社會活動家一起喫飯。

sentences.english: Hong Kong activists set sail for theEast China Sea, departing from Cheung Chau Island near Hong Kong on Sept. 22.
sentences.chinese: 9月22日，香港活動家離開長洲島向中國東海出發。

sentences.english: Today he is the prime mover in China's most prestigious think tank.
sentences.chinese: 今天他是中國最有聲望的智庫中主要的活動家。

sentences.english: Hong Kong activists set sail for theEast China Sea departing from Cheung Chau Island near Hong Kong on Sept. 22.
sentences.chinese: 9月22日，香港活動家離開長洲島向中國東海出發。

sentences.english: A generation of political activists have been transformed by new tools developed on the internet.
sentences.chinese: 一代政治活動家們已被互聯網上創生的新工具改變。

sentences.english: Campaigners hope this will stop similarecological disasters from happening again
sentences.chinese: 活動家們希望，這將阻止再次發生類似的生態災難。

sentences.english: E. B. Du Bois was a distinguished thinker and activist in African-American history.
sentences.chinese: 杜波依斯是美國黑人史上一位偉大的思想家和活動家。

sentences.english: Liang Qichao was a famous activist and statesman in mod ern China.
sentences.chinese: 梁啓超近代中國著名的報刊活動家和政論家。

sentences.english: Campaigners say more than 17 albinos have been killed in Tanzania in the last few years.
sentences.chinese: 活動家稱最近幾年已經有超過17人在坦桑尼亞被殺。

sentences.english: New Delhi PolOffs subsequently met with Delhi-based human rights activists.
sentences.chinese: 新德里使館的政務官隨後會見了新德里的人權活動家。

sentences.english: Flatjo Bjondo was a famous social activist and scholar in the Italian Renaissance.
sentences.chinese: 比昂多是意大利文藝復興時期著名社會活動家和學者。

sentences.english: "I am speechless, " one pro-democracy activist told al-Jazeera.
sentences.chinese: “我說不出話來，”一親民主活動家告訴半島電視臺。

sentences.english: Since leaving the White House, she has worked as an artist and activist.
sentences.chinese: 儘管離開了白宮，但是她任作爲藝術家和政治活動家。

sentences.english: This fuels the drive of animal welfare activists.
sentences.chinese: 這推動了保護動物活動家的動力。

definition: General Douglas MacArthur (1880-1964), US commander in Pacific during WW2, sacked in 1951 by President Truman for exceeding orders during the Korean war
Marcus Tullius Cicero (106-43 BC), famous Roman politician, orator and philosopher, murdered at the orders of Marc Anthony
Joseph Needham (1900-1995), British biochemist and author of Science and Civilization in China
variant of 邱吉爾|邱吉尔[Qiu1 ji2 er3]
jurist/member of the pre-Han legalist school
Franklin/Benjamin Franklin (1706-1790), US Founding Father, scientist and author/surname Franklin
Marshal Josip Broz Tito (1892-1980), Yugoslav military and communist political leader, president of Yugoslavia 1945-1980
